overview: Eli Timoner, a dedicated husband, father, and entrepreneur who founded the airline Air Florida in the 1970s, decides to medically terminate his life. During the 15-day waiting period, the bedridden but sharp-witted Eli says goodbye to those closest to him and helps them prepare for his departure. While his loved ones look back on Eliâ€™s successes and devastating blows, they struggle to reconcile his choice.
tagline: Join the Timoners as they embark on their father's final journey
title: Last Flight Home
